attributes.action: Layla's Law Vaccinate all UK Children against Meningitis B, now.
attributes.additional_details: Professionals in the field of Menigococcal agree all children should be Vaccinated
attributes.background: My 6 year old great niece recently died of Meningitis B, which vaccination would and should go avoided

rejection.details:
We are very sorry for your loss. You may wish to sign an existing petition on this issue:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/184173
